entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Burns Lake

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
